text: لَهُمْ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: For them will be the Home of Peace with their Lord. And He will be their protecting friend because of what they used to do.
translation.id.indonesian: Bagi mereka (disediakan) darussalam (surga) pada sisi Tuhannya dan Dialah Pelindung mereka disebabkan amal-amal saleh yang selalu mereka kerjakan.
